CustomField.description: Control: the ability to influence and direct the steps of a buying process
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Control: the ability to influence and direct the steps of a buying process
CustomField.label: MD Eval: Control

value.fullName: 00 - No follow-up documentation of client conversations
value.label: 00 - No follow-up documentation of client conversations

value.fullName: 02 - Meeting concludes with next steps agreed upon
value.label: 02 - Meeting concludes with next steps agreed upon

value.fullName: 04 - Sponsor Letter (email) agree upon/modified (Sponsor Email Required)
value.label: 04 - Sponsor Letter (email) agree upon/modified (Sponsor Email Required)

value.fullName: 05 - Buying and decision processes shared by potential Power Sponsor
value.label: 05 - Buying and decision processes shared by potential Power Sponsor

value.fullName: 06 - Power Sponsor Letter (email) and MAP sent (Power Sponsor Email Required)
value.label: 06 - Power Sponsor Letter (email) and MAP sent (Power Sponsor Email Required)

value.fullName: 07 - Power Sponsor Letter (email) and MAP accepted /modified (Draft Evaluation Plan Required)
value.label: 07 - Power Sponsor Letter (email) and MAP accepted /modified (Draft Evaluation Plan Required)

value.fullName: 08 - First customer-owner step of the MAP completed
value.label: 08 - First customer-owner step of the MAP completed

value.fullName: 09 - Final proof step completed to satisfaction of Power Sponsor
value.label: 09 - Final proof step completed to satisfaction of Power Sponsor
